name: IBMRationalAPITask
description: Run IBM Rational Integration Tester tests.
author: IBM

inputs.name: selectedOption
inputs.label: Configuration Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of the test to execute.

inputs.name: productpath
inputs.label: Product Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The fully qualified path to the IBM Rational Integration Tester application. Use '\\' or '/' as the file separator. This path must exist on the agent.

inputs.name: projectdir
inputs.label: Project Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The fully qualified path to the IBM Rational Integration Tester project directory. Use '\\' or '/' as the file separator. This path must exist on the agent.

inputs.name: projectname
inputs.label: Project Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the API test project.

inputs.name: environment
inputs.label: Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: The API Test environment to use for this execution.

inputs.name: tests
inputs.label: Test(s) to run
inputs.helpMarkDown: Semicolon separated list of tests/suites to run.
